name: Sherpa House Restaurant and Culture Center
description: Discover the wonders of the Himalayas at Sherpa House Restaurant and Cultural Center in Golden, CO. Since 2009, my establishment has served as an exhibition of the vibrancy and depth of Sherpa culture. Anyone who appreciates food, people, art, and beauty is sure to find something to love here. You could enjoy delicious meals while also learning more about the Sherpas.Stunning Décor and Outdoor Spaces If you believe that a restaurant's atmosphere is just as important as its food, you'll love my place. Not only does it have an eye-catching interior design that realistically captures the nature of Sherpa living spaces, but it also has a lovely garden, cozy outdoor patios, and tranquil water features. Delightful Himalayan Cuisine At my restaurant, you can savor delicious and heart-healthy Himalayan cuisine at great prices. From entrées like chicken tikka masala and thukpa to desserts like mango kulfi and gulab jamun, my dishes are sure to take your taste buds on a journey.
localName: Sherpa House Restaurant and Culture Center

name: The Buffalo Rose
description: Dining at The Buffalo Rose is more than a delightful culinary experience, it is also a trip back in time to the American West just as it was in the late 19th century. A visit to Golden simply isn’t complete without a stop in at The Pulse of Golden Since 1859. The menu concept is best described as regionally inspired American cuisine with a strong Latin influence presented with creative Western flare. Our beautiful collection of new and recently renovated historic buildings are located in the very heart of downtown Golden, directly beneath the “Howdy Folks – Welcome to Golden” sign, so we’re really easy to find. Come on in, grab bite, and feel the pulse of Golden, Colorado.
address: 1119 Washington Ave 12th St. & Washington Ave., Golden, CO 80401-1142

name: Domino's
description: Plant-based 1950's diner located on Harrison Avenue in downtown Leadville. Look for the Golden Burro neon marquis.
address: 710 Harrison Ave Between 7th and 8th, Leadville, CO 80461-3562

name: Old Capitol Grill & Smokehouse
description: Our Place is Yours: Old Capitol Grill & Smokehouse has become one of Colorado’s favorite eateries for locals and visitors alike. The Capitol offers up a full menu of on-site smoked meats, classic American fare, featuring our housemade dishes with some unique twists, in an historic setting. We have brought back some of the grandeur of the building from its heyday as the capitol building of the Colorado Territory and in celebration of Colorado’s beauty. The colors, light fixtures and wall art are reflective of the mid-1800s period, when Colorado’s Territorial Legislature met within its walls.

name: Woody's Wood-Fired Pizza
description: Woody's has been a staple in downtown Golden for nearly 29 years. We are known for your friendly service, fun atmosphere, and delicious (yet affordable) food. In 2022 we were voted best pizza, wings, and family restaurant in Golden as well as Yelp's TOP 100 PIZZERIAS in the US! Come see us for dine-in OR for our brand-new Take-out & Delivery kitchen!

name: Golden Bee
locationString: Colorado Springs, El Paso County, Colorado
description: The Golden Bee is famous for its Gastropub food and yards of the finest ales from an extensive collection of English, Irish and local craft breweries. While our Fish & Chips have stood the test of time, the new menu embraces some Gastropub favorites. Guests are encouraged to participate in the cheerful atmosphere by joining the nightly ragtime piano beginning at 7:30 pm, and the sing-along beginning at 9:00 pm nightly, while proudly wearing their own ‘Bees’ that change seasonally.
address: 1 Lake Ave Located on Lake Avenue and First Street across from Broadmoor Main., Colorado Springs, CO 80906-4269
